title: Secret Origins
episode_desc: Batman and Superman team up to deal with an alien invasion, and a telepathic message leads the duo to a military base housing future ally J'onn J'onzz.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Secret Origins: Part II
episode_desc: With the nation's warheads disarmed by Superman after a peace initiative, the heroes rally to stop nocturnal alien invaders from blocking out the sun.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Secret Origins: Part III
episode_desc: The heroes are captured by the aliens just as their leader, the Imperium, arrives. After vanquishing the invasion, they decide to officially join forces as the Justice League.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: In Blackest Night
episode_desc: Green Lantern is brought up on charges of genocide and is forced to attend an intergalactic trial courtesy of the Manhunters.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: In Blackest Night: Part II
episode_desc: Suspecting a railroad job, the League digs deeper into the charges against the Lantern. When the Guardians of the Universe arrive, the Manhunters' true motivation is revealed.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Enemy Below
episode_desc: The team encounters an agitated Aquaman while trying to rescue a submarine crew. His opinion of surface dwellers doesn't improve after an attempted assassination by Deadshot.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Enemy Below: Part II
episode_desc: The team is captured after helping Aquaman stop an underwater coup by his half-brother, Orm. Struggling to free himself and his son from death, Aquaman sacrifices his own hand.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Paradise Lost
episode_desc: Wonder Woman returns to Paradise Island after her abrupt departure, only to find the Amazons turned to stone. Sorcerer Felix Faust demands three mystical artifacts as the ransom.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Paradise Lost: Part II
episode_desc: While helping Wonder Woman liberate her island, the League discovers Faust is attempting to free Hades and open a portal to Tartarus, a pit of souls.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: War World
episode_desc: While handling an asteroid in space, Superman and J'onn J'onzz are captured and banished to Warworld, a planet where combatants are forced to duel to the death.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: War World: Part II
episode_desc: Fight promoter and new contestant Mongul instructs Superman to throw the fight against him, or he'll destroy the enslaved Draaga's home planet.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Brave and the Bold
episode_desc: Gorilla Grodd uses a mind-control device to obtain isotopes that will help destroy Gorilla City. To that end, he enlists Flash to oppose the Green Lantern.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Brave and the Bold: Part II
episode_desc: Central City is under the rule of Grodd, who plans on attacking Gorilla City with missiles. As Flash confronts the maniacal ape the team races to stop the destruction.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Fury
episode_desc: The Justice League must battle a fanatical Amazon scheming to kill all the men in the world.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Fury: Part II
episode_desc: With the male heroes suffering from Aresia's bio-weapon, the female Justice Leaguers race to stop their foe before she can contaminate the entire planet.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Legends
episode_desc: Several Leaguers are flung into another dimension populated with Green Lantern's childhood comic book heroes, the Justice Guild.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Legends: Part II
episode_desc: Still trapped in an alternate dimension, the Leaguers help the Justice Guild wage war against the Injustice Guild. But the secret behind this reality threatens to erase them all.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Injustice for All
episode_desc: Arrested and terminally ill, Lex Luthor breaks out of prison to assemble a team of supervillains to help him destroy the Justice League.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Injustice for All: Part II
episode_desc: His illness treated by Ultra-Humanite, Luthor pressures his cadre of super-villains to combat the League. While captured, Batman exploits the greed of the group to his advantage.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: A Knight of Shadows
episode_desc: The League joins with Etrigan the Demon to battle Morgan Le Fay's scheme of world conquest for her son.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: A Knight of Shadows: Part II
episode_desc: The diabolical Le Fays finally obtain the Stone and plan to use it to revert England back to Medieval Times; Wonder Woman resists the advantage of Harv Hickman-just before he is turned into a parasite.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Metamorphosis
episode_desc: Green Lantern's friend is transformed into a monstrous elemental shape-shifter by his jealous employer and is tricked into thinking Green Lantern is responsible.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Metamorphosis: Part II
episode_desc: A confused Mason/Metamorpho is finally convinced the League is there to help him. Together they race to head off the newly transformed Stagg before he kills Mason's fiancé-his own daughter.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Savage Time
episode_desc: The Justice League go back in time to World War II to prevent the immortal Vandal Savage from using future technology to change history.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Savage Time: Part II
episode_desc: Mired in World War II, the Leaguers discover that Vandal Savage has usurped Hitler and is getting technology from his future self, setting the stage for his eventual rule.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Savage Time: Part III
episode_desc: With the help of Sgt. Rock, the League races to stop Savage's plans to invade the U.S. with warplanes and forever alter the course of world history.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Twilight
episode_desc: Darkseid convinces the League to help him fight Brainiac from destroying his planet of Apokolips.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Twilight: Part II
episode_desc: Trapped in Brainiac's headquarters, a temperamental Superman discovers that the metal monstrosity has made a deal with Darkseid, whose own son Orion engages him in battle.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Tabula Rasa
episode_desc: Lex Luthor finds an extremely advanced android that can imitate superpowers and manipulates it to attack the Justice League.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Tabula Rasa: Part II
episode_desc: Android Amazo has absorbed most of the League's powers, but begins to question Luthor's true motivations. Meanwhile, Batman reveals he has a contingency plan for Superman going AWOL: Kryptonite.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Only a Dream
episode_desc: A man becomes a supervillain who attacks his victims in their dreams.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Only a Dream: Part II
episode_desc: With the other members of the Justice League trapped in their worst nightmares, Batman and Martian Manhunter have to defeat Doctor Destiny and save them before it is too late.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Maid of Honor
episode_desc: Diana makes friends with a flighty princess only to discover her fiancé is the immortal supervillain Vandal Savage.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Maid of Honor: Part II
episode_desc: The Justice League works to thwart Vandal Savage's plan to blackmail the nations of the world with an orbiting railgun.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Hearts and Minds
episode_desc: After learning of his mentor Katama's fall in battle, the Green Lantern travels to a world at the edge of the galaxy to investigate.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Hearts and Minds: Part II
episode_desc: Joined by Hawkgirl, Martian Manhunter, and the Flash, the Green Lantern and Katma face the fanatic cult leader Despero in an effort to stop his plans to conquer the galaxy.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: A Better World
episode_desc: In an alternate reality, a version of the Justice League known as the Justice Lords discovers the League's world and plot to take it over.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: A Better World: Part II
episode_desc: With the Justice League out of the way, the Justice Lords begin to establish their own style of order.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Eclipsed
episode_desc: Released by a soldier, an evil entity takes control of various people and threatens the world.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Eclipsed: Part II
episode_desc: With the other members of the Justice League possessed by the entities, the Flash must find a way of stopping them from carrying out their plan to exterminate humanity.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Terror Beyond
episode_desc: Solomon Grundy attacks a harbor. After the military has him contained, Aquaman arrives and steals Grundy. When the League finds out Aquaman is involved, they head to Dr. Fate to get some answers.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: The Terror Beyond: Part II
episode_desc: Fate and Aquaman wanted to sacrifice Grundy to prevent the return of a mystic being. The being has arrived; Aquaman leaves to protect Atlantis. Hawkgirl finds out the being had visited her homeworld long ago.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Secret Society
episode_desc: While the Justice League is experiencing serious internal friction, Gorilla Grodd carefully assembles a well organized supervillain team to attack it.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Secret Society: Part II
episode_desc: With the Justice League disbanded, its former members are targeted by the super-villains of the Secret Society.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Hereafter
episode_desc: During a battle with the Revenge Squad, Superman apparently falls in battle.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Hereafter: Part II
episode_desc: Superman has been transported into the distant future. With no powers, he must find a way to get back to the present, he finds an unexpected ally in Vandal Savage, the Earth's lone human survivor. Meanwhile in the present, Lobo joins the League, as Superman's replacement.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Wild Cards
episode_desc: The Joker creates havoc in Las Vegas with his Royal Flush Gang.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Wild Cards: Part II
episode_desc: The Joker's real plan becomes apparent when he unleashes Ace upon the Justice League.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Comfort and Joy
episode_desc: Members of the Justice League celebrate Christmas.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Starcrossed
episode_desc: Hawkgirl's people, the Thanagarians, arrive to offer the planet protection from another alien race threatening to invade Earth.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Starcrossed: Part II
episode_desc: With Earth now under Thanagarian control, the Justice League goes into hiding to recover and cope with the betrayal of one of their own.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.

title: Starcrossed: Part III
episode_desc: The Justice League launch an assault on the Thanagarians before the activation of a hyperspace gate that will destroy Earth.
show_desc: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.
